name: Primitive Space
description:
A small prototype for Make Games SA

Competition G: Graphically Primitive

Details of comp here: http://makegamessa.com/discussion/3865/competition...

and comp post here: http://makegamessa.com/discussion/3876/comp-g-prim...

Controls:

WASD to move and Left mouse to fire

press esc to return to the start screen

circle projectiles explode at their target location with no intermediate collision

square projectiles are standard missile like shots

the circle frame has a delayed summoning mechanic on its bullets

square frame has a generic fixed spread shot and a slightly slower refire rate
